region.description: The AWS region where the SNS topic should be created. Determines the location where your topic resources reside.

topicName.description: The name of the SNS topic to be created. Must be unique within the AWS account. If not provided, the name will be generated automatically.

displayName.description: The display name of the SNS topic. If not provided, the name will be used as the display name.

fifo.description: Whether the SNS topic should be an Amazon SNS FIFO topic. Defaults to false.

encrypted.description: Whether the SNS topic should be encrypted. Defaults to false.
